title: Fix transparent submit confirmation dialog background on Test Page

requirements.summary: Fix the submit confirmation dialog in TestPage.tsx to use solid dark overlay (rgba(0,0,0,0.85)) and solid white card background (#FFFFFF) with navy (#0A1F44) text, removing all transparency that makes the underlying question content visible and the dialog unreadable
acceptanceCriteria: The submit confirmation dialog overlay has a solid dark background (rgba(0,0,0,0.85) or equivalent) — no underlying page content is visible through the overlay.
The dialog card has a solid white (#FFFFFF) background — no transparency or translucency.
All text in the dialog ('Submit Test?', unanswered question warning) is clearly readable in navy (#0A1F44) on the white card.
The 'Submit Now' button is clearly visible with solid navy (#0A1F44) background and white text.
The 'Continue Test' button is clearly visible with appropriate solid styling.
The fix applies on both mobile and desktop viewports.

file_operations.description: Remove all transparent/translucent background styles from the submit confirmation dialog. Apply solid dark background (rgba(0,0,0,0.85) or bg-gray-900/85) to the dialog overlay backdrop. Apply solid white background (#FFFFFF or bg-white) to the dialog card container. Ensure all dialog text uses navy (#0A1F44 or text-navy-900) for readability. Verify 'Submit Now' button has solid navy background with white text, and 'Continue Test' button has appropriate solid styling. Test on both mobile and desktop viewports to ensure no transparency issues.
